languages.text: Презрительный взгляд друкари впивается в вас из-за решетки. За его спиной по углам дрожат жертвы со свежими ранами — "корм" для ксеноса.
The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.
languages.original_text: Презрительный взгляд друкари впивается в вас из-за решетки. За его спиной по углам дрожат жертвы со свежими ранами — "корм" для ксеноса.

traits.locale_text: The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.
The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.
The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.
The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.

languages.text: Die Augen des Drukhari starren dich durch die Gitterstäbe hinweg verächtlich an. In den Ecken hinter ihm zittern Opfer mit frischen Wunden — "Futter" für die Xenos.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Die Augen des Drukhari starren dich durch die Gitterstäbe hinweg verächtlich an. In den Ecken hinter ihm zittern Opfer mit frischen Wunden — "Futter" für die Xenos.

languages.text: Le Drukhari vous fixe de son regard méprisant à travers les barreaux. Les victimes aux blessures récentes recroquevillées derrière lui sont là pour le sustenter.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Le Drukhari vous fixe de son regard méprisant à travers les barreaux. Les victimes aux blessures récentes recroquevillées derrière lui sont là pour le sustenter.

languages.text: 黑暗灵族的目光透过栅栏，轻蔑地盯着你。在他身后的角落里，浑身是伤的受害者正在瑟瑟发抖——那便是异形的“食粮”。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗灵族的目光透过栅栏，轻蔑地盯着你。在他身后的角落里，浑身是伤的受害者正在瑟瑟发抖——那便是异形的“食粮”。

languages.text: Los ojos del Drukhari te atraviesan con desdén a través de los barrotes. En las esquinas, sus víctimas cubiertas de cicatrices tiemblan. Sirven de «comida» para el xenos.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Los ojos del Drukhari te atraviesan con desdén a través de los barrotes. En las esquinas, sus víctimas cubiertas de cicatrices tiemblan. Sirven de «comida» para el xenos.

languages.text: デュカーリの目は、鉄格子越しに冷たくこちらを貫く。生傷を負った生贄が男の背後の隅で震えている…異種族の「エサ」だ。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリの目は、鉄格子越しに冷たくこちらを貫く。生傷を負った生贄が男の背後の隅で震えている…異種族の「エサ」だ。

languages.text: Drukhari, parmaklıkların ardından sana küçümseyici bakışlar atıyor. Zenoları doyurmak için oraya atılan, yarası taze kurbanlar ise farklı köşelere sinmiş.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari's eyes bore into you contemptuously through the bars. Victims bearing fresh wounds shiver in the corners behind him — "food" for the xenos.
